original_text: O god, the heathen are come into thine inheritance; thy holy temple have they defiled; they have laid Jerusalem on heaps.
korean_text: 하나님이여 이방 나라들이 주의 기업의 땅에 들어와서 주의 성전을 더럽히고 예루살렘이 돌무더기가 되게 하였나이다

sentences.original_text: the heathen are come into thine inheritance
thy holy temple have they defiled
they have laid Jerusalem on heaps
